CardMissingDate: OK. Please tell me the date.
DateAvailabilityCheck: Okay. Don't worry, I'll help you to block the card, to avoid any unauthorized transactions. Do you remember on what date the card went missing?
re-elicitDateAvailabilityCheck: I didn't get that. Do you remember on what date the card went missing? Please say either 'yes' or 'no'.
NoticedUnauthorisedTransaction: Got it. Did you notice any unauthorised transactions?
